sentences.en: Their claims will be fervently denied.
sentences.cn: 他们的索赔将被严词拒绝。

sentences.en: In her excitement she had forgotten her evening prayer, so sitting up in bed, she prayed fervently to God.
sentences.cn: 由于激动，她忘记了她的晚祷，所以她在床上坐起来，虔诚地向上帝祈祷。

sentences.en: Mr Jackson, a Congressman, fervently denies any wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 不过众议员杰克逊坚决否认自己在此事件中有舞弊之举。
